fields.title: Amazon Certificate
fields.short_description: $20 Amazon Gift Certificate for the individual with the highest number of points at the end of the Beta Test.
fields.long_description:
Books, notebooks, magazines, art supplies, computers... you name it, Amazon's got it. With this gift certificate you'll be able to pick something up that you need (or maybe just want!).

This $20 gift certificate goes to the individual with the highest point total at the end of the Beta Test.

fields.title: Bubbies Certificate
fields.short_description: A $5 Bubbies Gift Certificate (gets you a single scoop cone) for each member of the team with the most points earned during the Beta Test.
fields.long_description:
This gift certificate will score you one free ice cream cone from Bubbie's Ice Cream, just a short walk from the residence halls and one of the best ice cream parlors in Hawaii. 

To win this $5 gift certificate, your team must earn more points than any other team during the Beta Test.
